title: Chickasaw National Recreation Area: Mammals
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals     Mammals                Mammals            MAMMALS          Opossum   Short-tailed shrew   Least shrew     Eastern pipistrelle   Evening bat   Red bat     Nine-banded armadillo   Eastern cottontail rabbit   Swamp rabbit     Fox squirrel   Gray squirrel   Southern flying squirrel     Thirteen-lined ground squirrel   White-footed mouse   Deer mouse     Northern grasshopper mouse   House mouse   Hispid cotton rat     Norway rat   Muskrat   Pine vole     Coyote   Gray fox   Red fox     Long-tailed weasel   Mink   Spotted skunk     Eastern mole   Big brown bat   Black-tailed jackrabbit     Plains pocket gopher   Brush mouse   Eastern wood rat     Beaver   Raccoon   Striped skunk     Badger   Bobcat   White-tailed deer         Bison
